channel.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
channel.description:
This is my Third ever program (best of them all) Tell me what you think =D
[IMG]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/936/29264074.jpg[/img]
Download link here - http://uppit.com/b4we71770gib/FirstGuiCal.rar
other calculators found here
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,459663.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,458545.0.html

item.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Wow… abraham… I know I’m not smarter or older then you, but seriously… you act like an eleven year old child…

Read full topic
item.source: Third ever program (Best of them all)

item.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:17, topic:363566”]Woo, topic derailment by a bunch of morons! Go MoparScape!

@OP: Honestly, the GUI is very ugly. There should be buttons for everything, which means numbers, and then the output should be a textbox to allow the text to be copied. Try to make it similar to the Windows Calculator.[/quote]Exactly what I was saying.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:363566”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=459809.msg3365317#msg3365317 date=1286732903]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=459809.msg3364783#msg3364783 date=1286677681]
Make buttons to input numbers, and disable typing into the text box, then you don’t need to make sure that they only input numbers. (ie, Microsoft calculator)
[/quote]i dont know what the fuck you’re on about, the windows calculator can be typed in perfectly fine…and the fact that you are suggesting him not to support this makes you even more of a fuckwit
[/quote]What are you on about… I didn’t ask him to ‘not support’ anything.

I’m suggesting that instead of just having text boxes for the input, perhaps have some buttons.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Third ever program (Best of them all)

item.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Woo, topic derailment by a bunch of morons! Go MoparScape!

@OP: Honestly, the GUI is very ugly. There should be buttons for everything, which means numbers, and then the output should be a textbox to allow the text to be copied. Try to make it similar to the Windows Calculator.

Read full topic
item.source: Third ever program (Best of them all)

item.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“Adam, post:9, topic:363566”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=459809.msg3365492#msg3365492 date=1286739674]

This [quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=459809.msg3365317#msg3365317 date=1286732903]i dont know what the fuck you’re on about, the windows calculator can be typed in perfectly fine…and the fact that you are suggesting him not to support this makes you even more of a fuckwit
[/quote] == “Don’t listen to Davidi2, he doesn’t know what he’s talking about.”

Don’t see why you needed to rage out your asshole.

EDIT: @topic: Next revision make it support multiple operations.
[/quote]still buttfucking your little bud there?? seriously, sit the fuck down kiddie

I’ve no affiliation with Davidi2 and to be completely honest I’m just defending someone against your shitty attitude towards everything. Kiddie? Huh, whatever.

I guess going to a 40k a year private school and getting a more than decent education makes me a kiddie. You’re right.[/quote]hahaha

this post attests to the fact you are such an idiot…understand the fact that no one gives a shit whether you have fucking stupid parents that would pay 40k a year when they can find a better education (at least where i live there are public schools much better than any private school) at a public school; so seriously: shut the fuck up and learn your place

edit: and ps. learn what the term kiddie means in this context since your refutation was completely fucking illogical

Read full topic
item.source: Third ever program (Best of them all)

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Way to derail the topic guys

Anyways, I’m moderated, but my reply to abraham can be seen like 10 posts above. At least someone can get back on topic and reply to it.

item.title: Third ever program (Best of them all)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:13, topic:363566”][quote author=Adam link=topic=459809.msg3366168#msg3366168 date=1286811700]

I guess going to a 40k a year private school and getting a more than decent education makes me a kiddie. You’re right.

Doesn’t matter if you got free or paid education, you can still be a kiddie.

ps. don’t brag that you have richfag parents.

I’m saying the fact that I go to an expensive school (usually) means that it’s curriculum is top end. And I actually go to one of the highest rated schools in the Southeastern US.
[/quote]I thought being a ‘kiddie’ depends on your age, sir faggot.[/quote]
Then either way I wouldn’t be? You all confuse me. I’m done.

Read full topic
